snippet.title: ADLEY makes a ZOMBiE WEREWOLF!! in DEAD RAiLS! Mad Scientist experiment & Survive scary Vampire mobs
snippet.description:
JOIN THE FAM - https://www.youtube.com/@GforGaming

HEY EVERYBODY!! Welcome BACK to your absolute favorite gaming YouTube that you probably know as G for Gaming! As usual we've got another CRAZY adventure in store for you here today! We decided to return to this game that we had just played recently, it's pretty spooky, it's got trains, it's... DEAD RAiLS!

Today we decided to have Adley & Dad work together to try and survive in the Wild West of Roblox! We learned how to play this game even better and survive for way longer and there may even be a secret laboratory where we can put together a whole creepy werewolf! Werewolves aren't the only extra threat though! Of course, there are those pesky zombies but this time we had a crazy attack from VAMPiRES during a spooky Blood Moon! Shaun was really trying to find a bank because he found the combination for the vault and Adley and him could pull off a huge heist and get tons of money from the bank! But all of the towns were invaded by zombies and were super dangerous! Adley & Dad worked super hard together and survived some CRAZY attacks by spooky Roblox zombies! Being cowboys and trying to ride your train is hard work when you've got to deal with zombies, werewolves and vampires! Finding the secret laboratory was also a huge plus when we got to create the werewolf by putting the BRAiN into it and making it ALiVE!

Thanks for Watching!! BYE! PSSSSSHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

enjoy some A for Adley videos: https://www.youtube.com/c/AforAdleyLe...
have a blast with our A for Adley Shorts: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMHpfyAqrjrhn-mRS2bUL0g
share a best day ever with our family: https://www.youtube.com/user/Shonduras
fun best day ever shorts: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgVE...

watch the latest A for Adley video: TRAPPED inside a TRAMPOLINE PARK?! Family Freeze tag almost turns into Adley's overnight challenge
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uhewxVYJxQ0

this is our channel G for Gaming!! this is a place that i can share all of my favorite gaming moments!!
